titles: A word to the twenty essayes towards a settlement, &c. Who under a pretence of a testimony for God either ignorantly (as charity perswades) or voluntarily, give forth a perillous one, especially as to the concernable matter of it.
notes: A reply to: An essay toward settlement upon a sure foundation.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
